QUIET_ZONE_TOO_SMALL.title: Quiet Zone Too Small
QUIET_ZONE_TOO_SMALL.message: Quiet zone must be at least {minValue} modules for proper scanning. Current value is {value} modules.
QUIET_ZONE_TOO_SMALL.suggestion: Set quiet zone to {minValue} or higher

INSUFFICIENT_CONTRAST.title: Insufficient Color Contrast
INSUFFICIENT_CONTRAST.message: Color contrast ratio of {ratio}:1 is below minimum of {minValue}:1. QR code may not scan properly.
INSUFFICIENT_CONTRAST.suggestion: Increase contrast between foreground and background colors

LOGO_TOO_LARGE.title: Logo Too Large
LOGO_TOO_LARGE.message: Logo size of {value}% exceeds maximum of {maxValue}% of QR code area. This blocks too much of the scannable data.
LOGO_TOO_LARGE.suggestion: Reduce logo size to {maxValue}% or less

DATA_TOO_LONG.title: Data Too Long
DATA_TOO_LONG.message: Data length of {value} characters exceeds capacity of {maxValue} for error correction level {ecc}.
DATA_TOO_LONG.suggestion: Reduce data length or use lower error correction level

LOW_CONTRAST.title: Low Color Contrast
LOW_CONTRAST.message: Color contrast ratio of {ratio}:1 is below recommended {minValue}:1. Scanning reliability may be reduced.
LOW_CONTRAST.suggestion: Consider increasing contrast for optimal scanning reliability

LOGO_SIZE_HIGH.title: Logo Size Above Recommended
LOGO_SIZE_HIGH.message: Logo size of {value}% is above recommended {maxValue}%. This may affect scanning reliability.
LOGO_SIZE_HIGH.suggestion: Consider reducing logo size for better scanning

LOGO_WITHOUT_HIGH_ECC.title: Logo Without High Error Correction
LOGO_WITHOUT_HIGH_ECC.message: Using logo without highest error correction level (H). Current level is {ecc}.
LOGO_WITHOUT_HIGH_ECC.suggestion: Use error correction level H when adding logos for better reliability

SIZE_TOO_SMALL.title: QR Code Size Too Small
SIZE_TOO_SMALL.message: QR code size of {value}px is below minimum {minValue}px for reliable screen scanning.

SIZE_BELOW_RECOMMENDED.title: Size Below Recommended
SIZE_BELOW_RECOMMENDED.message: QR code size of {value}px is below recommended {minValue}px.
SIZE_BELOW_RECOMMENDED.suggestion: Consider using {minValue}px or larger for optimal scanning

DATA_NEAR_CAPACITY.title: Data Near Capacity
DATA_NEAR_CAPACITY.message: Data length of {value} characters is near capacity limit of {maxValue} for error correction level {ecc}.
DATA_NEAR_CAPACITY.suggestion: Consider reducing data for better reliability

MODULE_RADIUS_HIGH.title: Module Radius Too High
MODULE_RADIUS_HIGH.message: Module radius of {value} may reduce scanning reliability. Highly rounded modules can be harder to scan.
MODULE_RADIUS_HIGH.suggestion: Use module radius of 0.4 or less for better scanning

INNER_GAP_TOO_LARGE.title: Inner Gap Too Large
INNER_GAP_TOO_LARGE.message: Inner gap of {value} may affect scanning. Large gaps separate modules too much.
INNER_GAP_TOO_LARGE.suggestion: Keep inner gap below 0.1 for reliable scanning

export.allowed: QR code is safe to export
